item.title: Why write when AI can write better?
item.description: As AI becomes better at writing and creating, is there intrinsic value in human created content?

item.title: What is recency bias in LLMs
item.description: Prioritizing recent inputs over older ones

item.title: Never blame AI - Personal accountability in AI-assisted work
item.description: As AI tools become more integrated into our work the need for maintaining personal accountability and responsibility for output grows.
